channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Great Quotes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Great Quotes

item.title: CVE-2021-24785|2024-08-03T19:42:17.191Z -- unknown -- great%20quotes
item.description: The Great Quotes WordPress plugin through 1.0.0 does not sanitise and escape the Quote and Author fields of its Quotes, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html is disallowed.
